Zowe Commands: Always edit.description: Allow editing of commands before submitting

scripts.vscode:prepublish: yarn createTestProfileData && gulp build && yarn license && yarn lint && webpack --mode production && yarn updateStrings
scripts.build: yarn createTestProfileData && gulp build && yarn license && webpack --mode development
scripts.build:integration: yarn createTestProfileData && gulp build && yarn license && tsc --build --pretty
scripts.watch: yarn createTestProfileData && gulp build && webpack --mode development --watch --info-verbosity verbose
scripts.lint: yarn lint:src && yarn lint:tests && yarn lint:pretty && yarn markdown
scripts.lintErrors: echo "zowe-explorer: lintErrors coming soon with eslint."
